subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A link with Chris Moon

Frank:
                I think its wonderful that you are going to be selling them.  I sure will be the first one in line to purchase one made by you!!!   I have to so many people that want to make them and I have to laugh.  I told them they don't work for just the curious.  Not everyone has the gifts to use them.  I truly believe that your have to be passionate, and sincerely dedicated and the "powers that be" know this.  Thats what sets us apart from the rest!!!
   
  Best Wishes!
  Juli

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          Thanks, yeah it might be interesting. Chris and I get alot of direct 
responses when he brings a box over for tweaking, but usually when we're not 
recording. I guess Chris and I will be going into business to produce the 
boxes, and he hates it when I give them away, like I have been doing so far. 
I have no concept of money or or value.

Frank

>From: juli velazquez <ghostchasingfool@...>

>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A link with Chris Moon
>Date: Mon, 8 Jan 2007 13:32:21 -0800 (PST)
>
>Frank:
> I have video of the box being used, with a direct 
>response if you need it. Its from Waverly Hills and the Owner Tina 
>Mattingly walks into the room and Franks Box say "Hello Tina" very clear!!!
>
> Thanks!
> Juli
>
